headline: IMU Biosciences Appoints Dr. Carlos Paya as Non-Executive Director, Strengthening its Board of Directors
summary: PRESS RELEASE London, UK, 20 November 2025 — IMU Biosciences (or “the Company”), a biotechnology company decoding the immune system to drive next generation health outcomes, today announced the appointment of Dr. Carlos Paya as Non-Executive Director. Carlos has a distinguished track record of leadership spanning academic medicine and the biopharmaceutical industry, with deep expertise in drug development and commercial strategy across early-stage start-ups to large-cap pharmaceutical companies.
